intro.part1: I specialize in back-end development with Java and Spring Boot, building secure APIs with tools like JWT, Spring Security, Keycloak, and OAuth 2.0. I use MySQL and PostgreSQL for data storage, and deploy complete apps with Docker and AWS S3.
intro.part2: I'm also experienced with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and GitHub. While I focus on the back end, I can deliver full-stack solutions and manage Linux-based virtual machines for deployment and testing.
